subject: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Dear :Beneficiary,
We have been waiting for you to contact us for your
ATM VISA CARD
worth $4,500,000.00 (Four Million, five Hundred
Thousand United States
Dollars), being compensation fund for 150 scam
victims, but I did not
hear from you all this while And one Mrs Maria Dean
claims she is your
representative that we send the money to her.
Please I want to verify from you before we deliver
your ATM VISA CARD
to her, the issue of this compensation was approved
after the meeting
held behind closed doors between my humble self and
the Director
Federal Bureau of Investigation, United Nations
Representative in West
Africa and the Nigeria Government and their
presidency, so after this
meeting the entire house concluded that all victims of
scam will be
compensated by the Nigeria Government as a means to
sanitise them, So
all we need from you is to follow up our instruction
to enable you
receive your own ATM VISA CARD before it expires.
Further information, all the documents pertaining the
compensation is
intact with us including Insurance premium and
Clearance Certificate
Fee of the package showing that it is not Drug Money
or meant to
sponsor Terrorist attack in your Country.
So confirm the below information to enable our agent
get to your home
for delivering
ATM Visa Card:
1. Full Names:
2. Residential Address:
3. Phone Number:
4. Occupation
5. Country:
6. Identification:
Best Regards,
Mrs.Joy Gonna.

subject: Re:   Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Gonna,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the ATM VISA CARD. I must admit, I'm a bit surprised to hear about this opportunity. Can you please provide me with more details about how I became eligible for this fund? I want to make sure everything is legitimate before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. David,

How are you doing together with your family over there? l believe that all
is well.

l got your mail and the contents were noted. For the fact that this sound
as a surprise to you and you made it clear to me that, you're just getting
this information then, l would like to present you as the as the Next of
Kin to the Late Decreased so that the financial institution can be able to
release the said funds to you as the acting beneficiary of the funds in
question.

Every necessary documentation will be secure in your name and you will be
presented as the beneficiary of the funds and at the end of the transaction
we are going to map out 20% for the expenses that will occur, while you
will go along with 50% while the remaining 30% will come to me. lf you
agree with these, then you will have to send me your full details such as
full name, contact address and direct contact number. Once I receive this
requested information from you, l shall apply for the release of the funds
in your name and all documentation that will backup this transaction will
be secure in your name as the acting beneficiary of the funds in question.

l look forward to hearing from you.

Mrs. Joy

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mrs. Joy,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you and your family are doing well too.

I must admit, your email has caught me by surprise. I wasn't aware of any late deceased person or any funds associated with them. Could you please provide me with more details about this situation? I would like to understand it better before making any decisions.

Also, if you don't mind, could you explain how the expenses will be handled and what exactly my role would be in all of this? It would be helpful to have a clearer picture of what is expected from me.

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mrs. Joy,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you and your family are doing well too.

I must admit, your email has caught me by surprise. I wasn't aware of any late deceased person or any funds associated with them. Could you please provide me with more details about this situation? I would like to understand it better before making any decisions.

Also, if you don't mind, could you explain how exactly I would be involved as the next of kin and what my responsibilities would be? It would help me have a clearer picture of what is expected from me.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
l got your mail and the contents were noted.

Mr. David, the name of the decreased is Eng. Morris Gregson and also a
United Kingdom Citizen who died of Cancer of the lungs in New Zealand 2011
and according to the report. The $15.5 has been deposited in a private bank
for a very long time and now the financial institution are currently
calling us to present the Next of kin to the late decreased and that was
the reason why l decided to explain everything about this transaction to
you. Your responsibility is to stand as the acting beneficiary of the funds
in question, to enable the financial institution release the funds to you.
And if you still have any question to ask in regards to this, then feel
free to ask me.

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. David,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing the details about Eng. Morris Gregson. I'm sorry to hear about his passing due to lung cancer in New Zealand. It must have been a difficult time for his family and loved ones.

I understand that there are funds deposited in a private bank, and the financial institution is now looking for the next of kin to claim these funds. You mentioned that you would like me to stand as the acting beneficiary of these funds so that they can be released.

I appreciate your explanation so far, but I do have a few questions before proceeding. Could you please provide more information about Eng. Morris Gregson? What was his profession or occupation? Did he have any immediate family members? Also, could you clarify how much money is involved in this transaction?

Thank you for your assistance, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. David,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing the details about Eng. Morris Gregson. I'm sorry to hear about his passing due to lung cancer in New Zealand.

I understand that there are funds deposited in a private bank, and the financial institution is now requesting the next of kin to come forward. You mentioned that you would like me to stand as the acting beneficiary of these funds so that they can be released to me.

I have a few questions regarding this matter. Firstly, how did you come across my contact information? Secondly, what is the total amount of funds that are currently being held in the private bank? Lastly, what would be required from me in order to proceed with this process?

Thank you for your assistance and I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mrs. Joy,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you and your family are doing well too. This email does come as a surprise to me, as I wasn't aware of any late deceased person or funds. Can you please provide me with more information about the situation? I would like to understand it better before making any decisions.

Also, could you clarify what expenses you mentioned that would occur? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the process and what it entails.

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. David,

How are you doing together with your family over there> l believe that all
is well.

Well, l believe that l have already given you the name of the late deceased
which is ( Eng. Morris Gregson ) l will be providing you with the Death
Certificate in my next message.

Whatever expense that will occur, the Lawyer that will be appointed to act
on your behalf will be paid which you and I don't know how much he or she
will be charging for his or her legal fee. They are also going to secure
some vital documents to back up the claim in your name.

l look forward to hearing from you.

Mrs. Joy

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mrs. Joy,

Thank you for reaching out. I hope you and your family are doing well too. I appreciate the information about Eng. Morris Gregson and look forward to receiving more details in your next message. Could you please provide me with some more information about the process and what steps need to be taken next? Thank you.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mr. David,

l received your letter and the contents were noted.

The first step is to apply for the release of the funds first. We are
supposed to get a Lawyer that will also play a major role in this
transaction by representing you in the Legal process as well, whereby you
and the Lawyer will be in steady communication in terms of legal
documentation that will back up this transaction on your behalf.  As soon
as the scanning machine is in good shape, l will send you the Death
Certificate belonging to Eng. Morris Gregson.

Your Truly,

Mrs. Joy

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Mrs. Joy,
Thank you for your message. I understand the importance of applying for the release of the funds first. Could you provide more details on how to proceed with getting the Lawyer involved in the legal process? I want to ensure everything is done correctly. Looking forward to your guidance.

Best wishes,
David

subject: Re: Dear :Beneficiary,
body:
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you. How about you?

Best wishes,
David
